content:
PROCEDURE CODE
1219
In the event of the discovery of new facts or new documents which he considers to be decisive, the liquidating notary shall invite the parties by bailiff's writ, by registered letter or against dated acknowledgement of receipt, as well as their advisers by ordinary mail, fax or e-mail, to inform him of their observations on this subject within the agreed time limit or, in the absence of agreement between all the parties as to this new time limit, within a period of one month from his request.
